title: BBC Local Live: Sheffield and South Yorkshire on Monday 29 February 2016 - BBC News
summary: men jailed for rotherham race killing which sent 'shockwaves ' through community .
tour firm suspended after sheffield sisters die in vietnam waterfall tragedy .
new £ 56m robin hood airport link road opens and named great yorkshire way .
fifty-year-old woman dies after alleged altercation at sheffield social club .
public quiz sheffield bus bosses over controversial changes to city 's services .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: that 's the end of our live coverage today , thanks for joining us .
we 'll be back with you for more news , travel , sport and weather updates for sheffield and south yorkshire from 08:00 on tuesday .
if you have any photos or stories you 'd like to share with us , do get in touch .
author: Gemma Ashcroft
Local Live, BBC Sheffield

documents.title: coming up on bbc look north tonight
text: join us for look north at 18:30 on bbc one as we find out how yorkshire hospitals are dealing with a national shortage of doctors and nurses who care for premature and poorly babies .
also , with just days to go until harry and paul set off on their 120-mile three-legged walk , find out how their training 's getting on .
author: BBC Look North, Yorkshire

documents.title: passion for parkour takes sheffield teenager to new heights
text: a sheffield schoolboy has come on leaps and bounds after discovering a passion for the acrobatic craze known as parkour .
author: Sheffield Star

documents.title: watch : south yorkshire police on dangers of drug driving
text: the government released figures at the weekend showing more drug-drivers are being arrested and convicted since new laws were introduced in england and wales last year .
now south yorkshire police has made this short video on why you should n't drug-drive .

documents.title: women 's fa cup : holders chelsea face doncaster rovers belles in fifth round
text: women 's fa cup holders chelsea will begin the defence of their trophy at doncaster rovers belles .
the fifth-round tie on 20 march comes four days before chelsea start their women 's super league one title defence at the yorkshire club .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: two men jailed over racist rotherham killing
text: two men convicted of killing an 81-year-old grandfather in a racially motivated attack have been jailed .
mushin ahmed died 11 days after he was attacked by dale jones and damien hunt , both 30 , as he walked to prayers at a mosque in rotherham in august .
prosecutor andrew robertson qc said there was `` no doubt '' jones abused mr ahmed `` for no better reason than mr ahmed was asian '' .
jones , of norwood street , rotherham , was jailed for life with a minimum term of 32 years .
he was convicted of murder .
hunt , of doncaster road , rotherham , was jailed for 14 years for manslaughter .

documents.title: weather update : cloud this evening with rain coming later
text: cloud will thicken to bring outbreaks of sometimes heavy rain , preceded by hill snow for a time .
it will also become windy , helping temperatures to slowly rise overnight .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: latest headlines : woman dies after 'altercation ' at social club in sheffield and man jailed for 12 years after admitting child sexual offences
text: the top stories for sheffield and south yorkshire include :
author: Jenny Cork
BBC Sheffield, Local Live

documents.title: watch : harry and paul 's three-legged challenge - the training continues
text: when bbc look north 's harry gration and paul hudson agreed to walk through yorkshire on a three-legged challenge for sport relief , it 's probably fair to say they had n't really thought how tough it would be .
there are days to go now until they set off on their 120-mile walk , and their training is starting to bite .
look north 's cathy killick has been watching their progress on their first off-road trial .

documents.title: boost to donations at burgled sheffield shop
text: the manager of a charity shop where £ 200 was stolen by burglars is `` overwhelmed '' by the public 's support .
author: Sheffield Star

documents.title: vietnam waterfall deaths : tour firm suspended by authorities
text: vietnamese authorities have suspended the tour firm that guided three british tourists found dead near waterfalls in the south east asian country .
sheffield sisters beth anderson , 24 , and isobel squire , 19 , and christian sloan , 25 , from kent died in the da lat area of lam dong province on friday .
adventure tour operator dalat passion has been suspended and a tour guide has been questioned by the police .
local authorities said the tourists had been taken on an unofficial route .

documents.title: watch : the name of doncaster 's new link road is
text: the name has of doncaster 's new link road has been revealed .
until now the project has been officially known by the catchy title of the finningley and rossington regeneration route scheme ( farrrs ) .
it now has its new and permanent name , great yorkshire way .
and the # farrs link road is named the great yorkshire way .
more @ twitterid

documents.title: travel update : a6123 in rotherham is closed in both directions
text: the a6123 herringthorpe valley road is closed in both directions between doncaster road junction and laudsdale road junction because of an accident .
traffic is very slow on the approach .

documents.title: woman dies after 'altercation ' at sheffield social club
text: police have launched an investigation after a woman died following an alleged altercation at manor estates social club in the early hours of this morning .
the 50-year old woman was taken to the northern general hospital where she died a short time later .
south yorkshire police have urged anyone who witnessed the incident to contact them `` so we can establish the circumstances leading to this woman 's injuries '' .

documents.title: latest headlines : two men jailed for racially motivated killing and new doncaster link road named great yorkshire way
text: the top stories for sheffield and south yorkshire include :
author: Jenny Cork
BBC Sheffield, Local Live

documents.title: doncaster school draws the fifth round of the sse women 's fa cup
text: i 've been at the draw for the fifth round of the sse women 's fa cup .
it was n't at a fancy hotel in london or at the fa headquarters at wembley but at plover school in doncaster and two of the students made the draw .
author: Andy Kershaw
BBC Radio Sheffield

documents.title: watch : new robin hood link road
text: take a look at the route for the farrrs link road which opens in doncaster today .
the graphic shows how the new route will shorten journey times .
author: BBC Look North, Yorkshire

documents.title: police want help identifying a man they want to talk to about shoplifting
text: police are trying to track down this man they 'd like to talk to him about shoplifting in doncaster .
if you recognise him call crimestoppers on 0800 555 111 .

documents.title: part of new doncaster link road to open today - but still more work to do
text: the airport link road has been in the planning for the best part of a decade and even though it does n't go quite to the airport ( yet ) , it 's still going to mean a lot to donny .
the section opening today goes from the m18 to parrot 's corner , about a mile away from the airport .
the second phase is planned and funded , but not built yet .
that will be the road that takes you directly to the departure gate .
author: James Vincent
Reporter BBC Look North

documents.title: mushin ahmed killing : police condemn 'des attack 'because of colour of his skin '
text: south yorkshire police have spoken after the sentencing of two men for the killing of rotherham grandfather mushin ahmed .
dale jones and damien hunt , both 30 and from rotherham , have been sentenced to 32 years and 14 years respectively .
mr ahmed , 81 , was walking to morning prayers on 10 august last year when he was attacked by the two men in the east dene area of rotherham .

hunt and jones have never given an explanation for their own vicious actions that evening , but the court heard how mr ahmed was assaulted because of the colour of his skin , a fact that is as disturbing as it is des to cause harm to another human being because of their race , ethnicity , or religious belief is simply beyond reproach , i will never understand how anybody can treat another person in such a callous and inhumane manner . ''

documents.title: mushin ahmed killing : 'brutal assault sent shockwaves through community '
text: more on the sentencing of two men for the killing of rotherham grandfather mushin ahmed .
the 81-year-old was attacked just off fitzwilliam road on monday 10 august .
he died 11 days later .
dale jones ( below left ) , of east bawtry road , rotherham , .
was found guilty of murder and damien hunt , of doncaster road , rotherham was found guilty of manslaughter .

det ch insp victoria short , the senior investigating officer for this case , said : this brutal and unprovoked assault sent shockwaves through the local community , where mr ahmed was well-liked and highly regarded . ''

documents.title: breakingpair jailed for mushin ahmed killing
text: two men have been jailed for killing of 81-year-old mushin ahmed in rotherham .
dale jones has been sentenced to 32 years for murder and damien hunt to 14 years for manslaughter .
more to follow soon

documents.title: doncaster belles draw chelsea in fifth round of sse women 's fa cup
text: i 've been at plover primary school in doncaster today to see the draw of the fifth round of the sse women 's fa cup .
doncaster belles have drawn chelsea .
and they 'll play at home on sunday 20 march .
author: Andy Kershaw
BBC Radio Sheffield

documents.title: new doncaster link road will bring thousands of new homes , says council
text: doncaster council says the town will feel the benefits of the £ 56m link road to robin hood airport .
part of the road is due to open at 16:00 .
the # farrrs project is delivering thousands of new homes , easier access to @ twitterid and excellent business space

documents.title: weather update : cloudy afternoon with rain expected overnight
text: cloudy afternoon with a southerly breeze developing .
cloud will thicken to bring outbreaks of sometimes heavy rain .
it will also becoming windy , helping temperatures to slowly rise overnight .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: latest headlines : new doncaster link road opens today and public quiz sheffield bus partnership over changes to routes
text: the top stories for sheffield and south yorkshire include :
author: Jenny Cork
BBC Sheffield, Local Live

documents.title: flight to celebrate new doncaster link road
text: i 'm checking in at robin hood airport ahead of a special flight to take a look at the new link road from the air .
the road cost £ 56m and should almost halve journey times from sheffield city centre to the airport .
here 's doncaster mayor ros jones with the first ticket for the flight .
author: Kevin Larkin, Doncaster reporter, BBC Radio Sheffield

documents.title: listen : silverdale school tribute to isobel squire after tragedy in vietnam
text: izzy squire , 19 , and her half sister beth anderson , 24 , were seven weeks into a backpacking tour of asia when tragedy struck .
their bodies were found near datanla falls , in vietnam 's lam dong province , alongside that of christian sloan , from kent .
izzy used to be a student at silverdale school in sheffield and their head of sixth form lorraine agass paid tribute to the teenager .

documents.title: sheffield bus partnership quizzed by public over service changes
text: i 'm at sheffield town hall this morning for a public meeting being held by sheffield bus partnership .
they 'll be discussing the big citywide changes that came in in november .
a number of bus routes were removed , replaced or re-numbered , leaving many commuters frustrated .
the organisations responsible for bus travel in sheffield will also be answering commuters ' questions .
author: Liz Roberts
BBC Radio Sheffield, political reporter

documents.title: latest headlines : public meeting to discuss sheffield 's buses and part of doncaster 's new link road opens today
text: the top stories for sheffield and south yorkshire include :
author: Everard Davy
BBC Radio Sheffield News

documents.title: police support family of sheffield sisters after vietnam deaths
text: south yorkshire police have confirmed that they are supporting the families of beth giselle anderson , 24 , and her sister isobel mackensie squire , 19 after they died in vietnam .
the sisters , from sheffield , were found at the datanla waterfalls in the da lat area of vietnam on friday 26 february .
specially trained officers are supporting beth and isobel 's family during this extremely difficult time .
we are working closely with the fco to determine the full details around their death and to keep the family updated on the latest information from vietnam . ''

documents.title: sheffield stuntman hits big screen in sacha baron cohen movie grimsby
text: daredevil sheffield stuntman joel conlan is to hit the big screen doubling for sacha baron cohen in his new comedy movie grimsby .
author: Sheffield Star

documents.title: new robin hood airport link road : 'massive day for doncaster '
text: the £ 56m road will halve journey times from sheffield city centre to robin hood airport .
a massive day for doncaster , with the official opening of the # farrrs link road .
great news for , and !
@ twitterid r traffic lights @ twitterid corner going2be looked at ? tail backs from every direction @ the junction apart from new road !
@ twitterid we know there is heavy traffic at the moment , but the lights will be continually assessed in the coming hours .
@ twitterid looks sorted already !
thanks !
@ twitterid just travelled back to bawtry along the link from lakeside a very welcome drive !

documents.title: travel update : a1 exit slip road has a lane closed at a638
text: the southbound a1 has a lane closed on the exit slip road at the a628 junction near woodlands because a lorry has broken down .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: new link road for robin hood airport opens today
text: the new £ 56m finningley and rossington regeneration route scheme ( farrrs ) link road opens in doncaster today .
it means it will now only take 25 minutes to get from sheffield city centre to robin hood airport - almost halving the journey time .
from 4pm today traffic will be able to use the road between junction 3 of the m18 and bawtry road at parrots corner .
author: Kevin Larkin, Doncaster reporter, BBC Radio Sheffield

documents.title: tributes paid to sheffield sisters found dead near waterfall in vietnam
text: tributes have been paid to sisters from sheffield who have died while backpacking around vietnam .
beth anderson , 24 , and isobel mackensie squire , 19 , were found at the datanla waterfalls in the da lat area of vietnam on friday 26 february .
officials say they were near datanla falls , lam dong province , when one may have slipped , taking the others down .
the women 's family , from the ecclesall area of sheffield , said their lives would never be the same again .
two bright lights have gone out .
they shone brightly for 24 and 19 years for everyone who loved and adored them and everyone who came into contact with them .
beth and izzy were living a life of adventure and did so right to the end . ''

documents.title: latest headlines : doncaster link road opens and local police supporting family of two sisters who died in vietnam .

author: Everard Davy
BBC Radio Sheffield News

text: the a614 is partially blocked in both directions near the bull moor road because of an accident .

documents.title: watch : frosty start with a breeze developing this afternoon
text: today will be dry and bright , with increasing amounts of high cloud , after a widespread early frost .
a light southerly breeze will develop this afternoon , helping to make it feel cold .
see my full forecast below :
author: Kay Crewdson
Weather presenter, BBC Look North

documents.title: good morning : join us for today 's live coverage
text: morning !
it 's a frosty one out there today .
we 'll have all your news , weather , and travel from across sheffield and south yorkshire until 18:00 .
if you 've got any stories or photos do get in touch .
author: Gemma Ashcroft
Local Live, BBC Sheffield
